c1.name: Ascetics of Frost
c1.descriptionRaw: When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.
c1.description: When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.

c2.name: Frozen to the Bone
c2.descriptionRaw: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> is increased by 15%.
c2.description: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

c3.name: Ascendant Praise
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Divine Suppression
c4.descriptionRaw: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.
c4.description: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

c5.name: Crimson Lotus Bloom
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Rite of Resurrection
c6.descriptionRaw:
Using <color=#FFD780FF>Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune</color> revives all fallen party members nearby and regenerates 50% of their HP.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.
